name: BMW MD
description: Best Whatsapp bot made by Ibrahim Adams

SESSION_ID.description: Paste here session id that you have scanned

MODE.description: Enter true for public. false for private

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Enter true for autoview status. false for no

AUTO_READ.description: make it true if you want bot to read message

AUTO_TYPING.description: make it true if you want bot to show typing

AUTO_RECORDING.description: make it true if you want bot to show recording audio

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: make it true if you want bot to show always online

AUTO_BLOCK.description: make it true if you want bot to auto block only 212 numbers

REJECT_CALL.description: make it true if you want to reject call
